item.title: Flashing AOSP to Smartphones
item.description: Android is a great open source smartphone operating system and because based on Linux, with almost unlimited customization possibilities. Unfortunately, vendors like to lock their ecosystem down and this is only true for “stock Android” or more precisely the AOSP (Android Open Source Platform) and nowadays every single Android system shipped by popular manufacturers like OnePlus, Samsung and ZTE is bloated with tons of proprietary crapware and the even worse the Google services.
